creators.name: Linke, David
creators.affiliation: Leibniz Institute for Catalysis, Albert-Einstein-Str. 29 A, 18059 Rostock, Germany

description:
A repository template with workflows to maintain SKOS vocabularies on GitHub as a community or for yourself.

The workflows use the software voc4cat-tool and GitHub features like pull requests, gh-actions, gh-pages etc. to reduce the maintenance workload for contributors and editors. The template has been developed as part of the NFDI4Cat initiative and is used for the SKOS vocabulary for catalysis voc4cat.
